ticket.limit_reached: ‚ùå You already have {current} of {max} allowed tickets open. Please close an existing ticket before creating a new one.

autoClose.warning_description: This ticket has not been updated for a while and will be automatically closed in **{days} days** if there is no further activity.
autoClose.prevent_description: Simply send a message in this channel to keep the ticket active.
autoClose.closed_description: This ticket was automatically closed due to inactivity.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Before creating a ticket, take a look at these frequently asked questions
faq.solved_description:
Great! We're glad we could help you.

If you need help later, you can always create a ticket.

merge.title: üîó Merge Tickets
merge.description:
Select the ticket to merge into this one.

**Note:** The selected ticket will be archived and all users, notes, and a message log will be transferred.
merge.no_tickets: ‚ùå No other open tickets found to merge.
merge.complete_description: Ticket **#{sourceId}** from <@{userId}> has been merged into this ticket.
merge.archived_description:
This ticket has been merged into **Ticket #{targetId}**.

The channel is now locked.

messages.user_added_success: ‚úÖ {user} has been added to the ticket.
messages.close_requested: üîî {user} has requested to close the ticket.
messages.only_team: ‚ùå Only team members can perform this action.
messages.only_creator: ‚ùå Only the ticket creator can perform this action.

panel.title: üé´ Ticket System
panel.description: Select a topic to create a ticket.

language.only_admin: ‚ùå Only administrators can change the server language.
language.updated: ‚úÖ Server language has been set to **{language}**.

web.title: TRS Ticket Bot - Admin Panel
web.select_server: Select a server you want to configure with the Ticket Bot.
web.no_servers_desc: You are not an administrator on any server where the bot is.

panel_config.section_basic_desc: Main configuration for your ticket system
panel_config.section_channels_desc: Select Discord channels for tickets, logs and transcripts
panel_config.section_team_desc: Configure team roles and priority access
panel_config.section_topics_desc: Create topics users can choose from when creating tickets
panel_config.section_forms_desc: Define questions that will be asked when creating a ticket
panel_config.section_embeds_desc: Customize the appearance of ticket and panel messages
panel_config.section_panel_desc: Send or edit the panel message in a Discord channel
panel_config.guild_id_help: The unique ID of your Discord server (set automatically)
panel_config.ticket_category_help: Select one or more categories where ticket channels should be created. Hold CTRL/CMD for multi-select.
panel_config.log_channel_help: Select one or more channels for ticket logs (create, close, claim). Hold CTRL/CMD for multi-select.
panel_config.transcript_channel_help: Select one or more channels where ticket transcripts should be posted. Hold CTRL/CMD for multi-select.
panel_config.team_role_help: Legacy: Select one or more team roles. Use the new priority roles below for better control instead.
panel_config.priority_roles_help: Define which roles have access to tickets with specific priority. Red priority sees all tickets, Orange sees Orange + Green, Green sees only Green.
panel_config.priority_green_help: Roles with access to green (low priority) tickets
panel_config.priority_orange_help: Roles with access to orange (medium priority) tickets - also see green tickets
panel_config.priority_red_help: Roles with access to red (high priority) tickets - see all tickets
panel_config.topics_help: Topics are the options users choose from when creating a ticket. Each topic can have its own emoji, label and form fields.
panel_config.forms_help: Form fields are questions asked to the user when creating a ticket. The answers will then appear in the ticket.
panel_config.ticket_embed_help: Customize the message that appears in the ticket channel when a ticket is created.
panel_config.panel_embed_help: Customize the panel message from which users can create tickets.
panel_config.panel_channel_help: Select the channel where the panel message should be posted.
panel_config.multiselect_hint: üí° Tip: Hold CTRL (Windows) or CMD (Mac) to select multiple options.
panel_config.save_first: Save your settings first before sending the panel.
panel_config.panel_sent_success: Panel sent successfully! Users can now create tickets.
panel_config.github_commits_help: Receive notifications about new GitHub commits in a Discord channel

tos.title: Terms of Service & Privacy Policy
tos.section_1_intro: By using the TRS Ticket Bot, you accept the following terms:
tos.section_1_2: The operator is not liable for data loss or outages
tos.section_1_3: Abuse of the bot may result in exclusion
tos.section_1_4: The operator reserves the right to change or discontinue the service at any time
tos.section_2_intro: The TRS Ticket Bot collects and processes the following data in accordance with GDPR:
tos.section_2_1: Discord User IDs - To identify ticket creators and team members
tos.section_2_3: Ticket Content - Messages, attachments, and form responses in tickets
tos.section_2_4: Ticket Metadata - Priority, status, timestamps, assigned users
tos.section_2_6: OAuth Data - Discord profile, server memberships (for web panel access only)
tos.section_2_7: Server Configurations - Topics, form fields, embeds, channel IDs, role IDs
tos.section_3_intro: Your data is stored as follows:
tos.section_3_1: Bot active: Data is stored permanently while the bot is active on your server
tos.section_3_2: Bot removed: After removing the bot, all server-related data will be automatically deleted after 2 months
tos.section_3_3: Configurable: Server administrators can adjust the data retention period via configuration
tos.section_3_4: All data is stored locally on the operator's server
tos.section_4_intro: Your data is used exclusively for:
tos.section_4_2: Managing ticket workflows and team assignments
tos.section_4_4: Access control for the web admin panel
tos.section_4_5: No sharing with third parties, except as required by law
tos.section_5_1: Right to access - You can request information about your stored data
tos.section_5_2: Right to deletion - You can request deletion of your data
tos.section_5_3: Right to rectification - You can request corrections to your data
tos.section_5_4: Right to object - You can object to processing
tos.section_6_2: Admin panel access only for authorized server administrators
tos.section_7_text: The operator reserves the right to change these terms at any time. Changes will be published on this page.
tos.section_8_text: For questions or concerns, contact us:

premium.title: Premium Features
premium.upgrade_cta_description: Unlock all features and support development
premium.email_notifications_description: An email will be sent to this address for every new ticket. SMTP must be configured in .env (see documentation).
premium.auto_close_description: Tickets without activity will be automatically closed.
premium.custom_avatar_description: Direct link to an image (will be displayed as bot avatar in the ticket embed). Recommended: 512x512px, PNG/JPG
premium.dm_notifications_description: Enter the Discord User IDs of team members who should receive DM notifications about new tickets. One User ID per line. To get a User ID: Right-click on User ‚Üí "Copy ID" (Developer Mode must be enabled)
premium.feature_locked_basic: Customize the bot avatar in the ticket embed. Available from Premium Basic.
premium.feature_locked_pro: This feature is only available with Premium Pro.
premium.feature_locked_email: Receive email notifications for new tickets. Only available with Premium Pro.
premium.feature_locked_autoclose: Automatically close tickets after X days. Only available with Premium Pro.
premium.feature_locked_dm: Team members receive Discord DMs for new tickets. Only available with Premium Pro.
premium.category_limit_hint: üí° With Premium Basic: 7 categories | With Premium Pro: Unlimited

customBranding.title: Custom Branding
customBranding.description: Customize the colors and texts of your ticket embeds to match your brand.
customBranding.feature_locked: Custom Branding is only available with Premium Pro.

vip.title: VIP User System
vip.description: Manage VIP users with highest priority
vip.vip_role_description: The VIP role has been set to
vip.feature_locked: VIP System is only available on specific servers.

department.title: Departments
department.description: Manage different departments for your ticket system
department.forwarded_description: This ticket has been forwarded to **{department}**.
department.no_departments: No departments configured! An admin must first create departments in the panel.
department.not_in_ticket: This command can only be used in a ticket channel.
department.new_ticket_forwarded: New ticket has been forwarded to your department!
department.feature_locked: Multi-Department Support is only available with Premium Basic+.

voiceSupport.channel_description: A voice channel has been created for this ticket: {channel}
voiceSupport.feature_locked: Voice Support is only available with Premium Basic+.
voiceSupport.already_exists: A voice channel already exists for this ticket!
voiceSupport.create_failed: Voice channel could not be created.
voiceSupport.ended_description: The voice channel has been deleted.
voiceSupport.description: Automatically create voice channels for tickets. Users and team can then communicate via voice.

outsideHours.description: Our voice support is currently unavailable. Please check back during our support hours or create a text ticket.
